name: Chicpins
description: Camera-pin set in tortoiseshell, with a satin bow, gilded croissant, and a leopard motif, stitches vacation vibes across jackets and hats, turning every tote into a little story for spontaneous day trips. Cluster them on blazers for gallery nights or dot denim jackets at weekend markets, finishing looks with flair.

name: Lifeisasport
description: Heritage houndstooth meets sporty ease in this wool cap, featuring a leather-look mantra patch proclaiming life is sport and play all day, bringing instant pep to coffee runs and campus sprints alike. Top off trench coats and wide-leg denim for chilly commutes or frame bike-short sets during weekend walks, sealing off-duty looks with retro-cool confidence.

name: Careslin
description: Threader chains with teardrop zirconia and pearl charms shimmer along the ear, offering layering power and subtle sway as they catch light from every angle. Layer them with a slip dress for rooftop celebrations, or stack one strand with a turtleneck in study sessions for whisper-light sparkle.

name: Ridges
description: Midnight pavé blankets sculptural domes with rhinestones that catch light like city windows at dusk, turning the cocktail rings into conversation magnets for evenings that glow. Layer them with a slip for a look, or stack the bands beside a knit for coffee catchups.

name: Pilatesclub
description: Mismatched cotton crew socks wink with bold slogans—“SPORTYISH” meets “PILATES GAL”—and a polka-dot grip sole that keeps every stride steady from studio sprints to campus errands. Layer them with leggings for gym or coffee runs, or let them peek above sneakers to finish the look.

name: Nightfaller
description: Cascading snake-chain fringe fans out from bead-clustered studs, catching light and delivering shoulder-skimming drama that makes these earrings conversation starters. Pair them with a sleek slip dress at rooftop cocktails or elevate vintage tees and leather pants on concert nights.

name: Astrobear
description: Bring a spark of joy to your everyday with Astrobear, a cute white bear bag charm accented by a bold black star. This playful accessory adds a fun and whimsical touch to your bags, making your style truly out of this world. Perfect for those who love a little charm in their daily routine!

name: Maplevale
description: Open-work hoops shimmer with hematite beads, a polished gold curve weaving texture into a sparkle that catches light at every turn, all day, every day. Frame them with a tee and jeans for strolls, or top a jumpsuit for nights out.

name: Myrage
description: A coiled metal square cradles wine-red cabochons, elevating clip-ons with an edge that catches light from coffee runs to city nights. Pair them with a slip dress for sunset shine, or frame a blazer-and-jeans brunch look with a touch of vintage glam.

name: Snakesa
description: Coiled serpent metalwork curves around the wrists, with golden scales tipped by jet crystals that radiate bold flair within one snap, a statement that pairs with dresses and with denim. Stack them with a dress for parties, or frame a sundress with a blazer for date nights.

name: Snakes
description: Gold serpents coil along the band, their inky crystals catching every flash as shoulder-skimming drops flicker under lights and turn a moment into a heartbeat. Layer it with a slip dress for rooftop cocktails, or cinch a leather tee and jeans for gigs, letting the shimmer finish the look.

name: Surferboy
description: This Stranger Things x ALDO keychain features the totally tubular Surfer Boy Pizza van and delivers the most iconic hanging charms: a mixtape, waffle, rubber chicken, playful bungee cords, and the iconic “Friends Don't Lie” quote.

name: Florabella
description: Hammered gold blooms catch flickers of light, anchoring oval loops of midnight glass beads into a sculptural pair that feels like garden romance in motion. Frame silk slips for a wedding moment or elevate a vintage tee with leather pants for late night gigs, letting the blooms frame the face with easy, confident glow.

name: Tinsla
description: Faceted black beads form delicate bows that catch candlelight like tiny disco balls, while featherweight posts keep these statement earrings comfy through every toast and dance. Frame a silk slip dress at rooftop soirees or top with a leather jacket and sleek updo at late-night gigs for moody sparkle.

name: Cutiebow
description: Lettuce-edge cuffs flirt around ankles, a slim satin bow catching the eye against monochrome cotton crews, delivering a playful everyday polish. Layer them with a breezy midi for date nights or cinch denim with a cropped tee for campus coffee runs, letting the bows and shine finish the look.

name: Myrage
description: Ribbed gold squares cradle black cabochons like mirrors, and clip-on backs deliver bold polish without piercing, turning everyday moments into a quiet, confident shimmer. Pair them with silk blouses and trousers by day, or let loose waves frame your jumpsuits after dark, so the look shifts from desk-to-date with one easy twist.

name: Ovalsparkles
description: Glittering oval-cut zirconia centers crown these full eternity bands in a versatile two-piece set, catching city lights with every turn and inviting a closer look. Layer them with a blazer for cocktails or stack beside denim and a satin slip for city nights and effortless weekday polish.

name: Stonebrooke
description: Gunmetal crystals cloak circles that dangle from studs, turning these earrings into glittering halos that shine in low light. Wear with a slip dress at rooftop gatherings, or pair with ear cuffs and a blazer for gallery nights, and let the glow finish every moment.

name: Buttons
description: Textured gold-tone studs in a set with hearts, squares and ovals invite you to swap and stack to match every mood for endless mix-and-match moments. Layer the hearts with a blazer for cocktails, or stack the squares under a chunky knit at coffee catchups.

name: Bowly
description: Miniature velvet-look bows scatter across these semi-sheer tights, turning a wardrobe staple into charm that lasts all night. Layer them under a slip dress and ankle boots for rooftop drinks, or pair with loafers and denim shorts at casual brunch.

name: Tinsla
description: Hand-strung beads twist into oversized bows that shimmer like confetti, giving these lightweight studs playful swagger that catches attention before you even say hello. Frame them with a slip dress at birthday dinners or stack with denim and leather jackets on concert nights for instant party polish.

name: Roundsparkles
description: Mirror-bright solitaire crowns a slender band, catching light with a radiant glow that hints at refined polish and easy charm for day-to-night moments everywhere in every look. Stack both with a slip dress at rooftop weddings, or wear the solitaire solo alongside denim and a crisp white tee for understated shine.

name: Cozycloud
description: Cloud-soft brushed wool paired with lofty ribbed stitches turns this cuffed beanie into instant coziness without disrupting minimalist style. Top it over your puffer coat during snow-day commutes or frame weekend joggers and an oversized tee at fireside cabin hangs for softness that's polished too.

name: Frilluxe
description: Brighten your sock drawer with the Frilluxe 2-pack ruffle socks, featuring one sleek black pair and one crisp white pair. Each sock boasts adorable ruffled edges for a playful, feminine touch that elevates any outfit. Perfect for mixing and matching while keeping your style fun and fresh every day.

name: Cozycloud
description: Plush teddy-fleece loops give this rib-knit beanie cloud-soft comfort while the deep cuff adds snug structure that keeps warmth locked in from sidewalk coffees to snowy hikes. Top it off with your tailored wool coat for city commutes or finish your puffer-and-leggings combo on weekend errands to seal cozy vibes.

name: Sheerie
description: Two-tone tights glide on as a duo of silky sheer fabric in wine and noir, offering stretch from morning to night. Layer this pair under a slip dress for rooftop dates or cinch a blazer-shorts set for desk-to-dance flair, to carry you from coffee runs to after-hours.

name: Sheerly
description: Silky matte tights wrap legs in deep blackout coverage, their stretchy polyester knit moving like second skin for confident strides from morning commutes to midnight cab rides. Layer under a plaid mini and loafers for campus lectures, or frame leather shorts with ankle boots for gig nights.

name: Yeikin
description: Champagne-tinted baguette stones pave micro crystals across playful open rings, turning a five-piece stack into a statement that catches the light with every gesture and pairs effortlessly with day-to-night outfits. Layer the drops with a blazer for cocktails, or stack them with a knit at coffee runs to finish looks with subtle drama.

name: Wildchic
description: Leopard-print calf-hair studs pair with ovals and polished huggie hoops in a three-pair set that adds texture and a subtle gleam to city-ready looks. Swap or stack them to dress satin slips for dinners or finish bomber jackets with jeans during laid-back errands.

name: Frillie
description: Scalloped frill crowns these over-the-knee rib-knit wool socks, wrapping legs in cozy stretch that feels like your favorite sweater, only warmer for boot-season wanderings. Layer them under lug-sole ankle boots for coffee runs, or let the fluttery edge peek above riding boots on crisp campus walks.

name: Cozycove
description: Step into ultimate comfort with Cozycove slippers. Wrapped in plush sherpa, they keep your feet warm and snug all day. The playful bow and secure strap add a touch of charm and ensure they stay perfectly in place, making relaxation feel even cozier. Perfect for lounging or quick errands, these slippers bring a cozy twist to your home routine.

name: Polkafrill
description: label

name: Cheetahluxe
description: Glossy gold bangles etched with striding cheetahs deliver instant stack appeal and a whisper of untamed confidence that catch light with every move on wrists everywhere. Layer them over satin slips at twilight parties or stack beside your watch during campus days for quiet flair.

name: Luxecrew
description: label

name: Cozycove
description: Step into ultimate comfort with Cozycove slippers. Wrapped in plush sherpa, they keep your feet warm and snug all day. The playful bow and secure strap add a touch of charm and ensure they stay perfectly in place, making relaxation feel even cozier. Perfect for lounging or quick errands, these slippers bring a cozy twist to your home routine.

name: Tinnie
description: A velvety bag charm swings from a gold ring, its bow trailing like streamers to bring cheer to any key or tote handle. Clip it to a structured satchel for campus dashes, or let it dangle from your wristlet at holiday mixers for instant whimsy.

name: Bamey
description: Velvety deep-red petals unfurl around a sparkle of faceted beads, turning the twin studs into miniature corsages that catch candlelight and instantly lift even the simplest look. Pin them on for wedding-guest brunches with a satin midi, or stack beside tiny hoops at rooftop concerts for moody drama.

name: Glimery
description: Fine vertical ribbing runs from cuff to toe on these cotton crew socks delivering cushy comfort in earthy neutrals that slip effortlessly between sneakers loafers and lounging. Layer under chunky boots for campus mornings or flash above sport sandals on post-hike coffee runs finishing outfits easily.

name: Slouchie
description: label

name: Serpenta
description: Snake studs flicker with pave crystals along gilded curves, emerald-tipped eyes, and a silhouette that brings mythic edge to every head turn. Frame a ponytail beside a jacket for nights out, stack hoops with a slip for drinks and tunes.
